Christopher L Saitta is the chief executive officer of Equator, the nationâ€™s premier provider of default servicing software and technology. Mr. Saitta co-founded Equator in 2003 and currently presides over strategic direction and corporate alignment for all business units.

Mr. Saitta has over 20 years of executive management leadership experience and has led technology innovation with such companies as eBay, Idea Labs and the California Institute of Technology. In 2002, he was awarded the Inman Most Innovative Technology award for the creation of the first online Real Estate Offer Management System. To date, that system has handled over $200 billion in real estate sales.
